entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
